body: Ah yes, the Three Pieces of the Fair Maiden: "Left Boob", "Right Boob", and "Vagina" vs. "One-Eyed White D." with its ultimate attack "Burst Stream of White D-ikstruction". Even with a real woman in front of him, Kaiba would still resort to the good ol' "beatdown" tactics. "That's right! I will sacrifice losing my virginity!" What a chad. On a side note, the title is the same as a Satoshi Kon movie, don't know if it's a reference or not.
